message: Working with law enforcement in SC, is an honor. ERASE has held three human trafficking investigative classes in SC for Local, State, & Federal Law Enforcement Officers and County Solicitors.  Agencies that attended are committed to making a difference in combatting human trafficking.

data.description: Law enforcement officials from 13 area agencies are attending a three-day human trafficking course the Horry County Sheriffs Office is sponsoring.
data.title: Law enforcement officials learning to combat human trafficking in the Grand Strand
